name: Tokyo Let's Go!
description:
A big city can be really intimidating! Welcome inside my head.. can you keep your cool while helping me to stay calm?

Abstract representations of Tokyo city elements enter the screen. Create an orbit by left-clicking somewhere and dragging the mouse in any direction before releasing. If you successfully catch an object in the orbit you've created, you can score points by clicking on them. Keep scoring to avoid stress. Too much stress means game-over!

Tokyo Let's Go! is made by Emiel Kampen during his week long visit to Tokyo. With this game, Emiel is trying to let you experience as a player how he felt at times while visiting Tokyo. Tokyo is an amazing and beautiful city, but the crowded area's throw a lot of sounds, people and events at you! Emiel was visiting Tokyo to film the final episode of Gamekings, a Dutch TV show about video games.

!! Please NOTE that the Mac version does currently NOT have any AUDIO, the Windows version does have sound and music !!
